title: HELP ME PLEASE....
body: > just launched league client smth popped up and it says league client needs update or something ok client restarted and league started updateing it says you need to download 60 MB ETA waiting time was 2-3 Minute... but its not stopping  i cant launch my game its going on 520 MB and ETA time on -10 MIN whats wrong with it guys plz help me... btw English is not my first language and dont judge me for it {{champion:119}} (http://imgur.com/a/QK3Ro)

replies.body: It sounds like you might have a weak or unstable connection that's backtracking and failing to grab every update.  You should let it do it's thing and finish unless you run into any errors, otherwise you could cause the patcher to scan your files for corruption.  Once finished, go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your connection to our patching servers.  I hope that helps!
